page.title: 09Interview with a mother
page.content: and Seniors when I was little,so it shows you how many children there is now.The shops have changed.Lots of things have.When I was smaller the police station wasn't behind Moody's as it is now.It used to be a farm.All of those things have changed. Do you use the Community Centre? No,I don't use it but I work there.My husband uses it a lot.He plays squash there and runs the squash team.Claire goes to the netball every week and sometimes goes to the Senior Youth Club there.There is a lot of things going on at the Community Centre.I don't think it is publicized enough.If they publicized it more they would get more people going. Do you always use the shops in the village? No.
